description: Name of the workspace or workgroup that owns this layer in the fleet mapping system; likely used to group related layers; confirm with SME.
Human-readable name of the map/GIS layer representing a category of fleet assets or infrastructure used for display, search, and filtering.
Identifier of the user or service that created the record for audit traceability.
Timestamp when the record was first created, typically stored in UTC.
Identifier of the user or service that last modified the record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the record, typically stored in UTC.
Numeric sequence controlling layer display order or processing priority within its group.
